html: Delighted to sign new customs arrangements with Guernsey, Jersey and the Isle of Man this morning @hmtreasury. The arrangements mean that when the UK leaves the EU, traders moving goods between the UK and Crown Dependencies will continue to pay no customs duty.pic.twitter.com/GCAl5VluxL
text:
Delighted to sign new customs arrangements with Guernsey, Jersey and the Isle of Man this morning @hmtreasury. 

The arrangements mean that when the UK leaves the EU, traders moving goods between the UK and Crown Dependencies will continue to pay no customs duty.pic.twitter.com/GCAl5VluxL

html: In 2016 we made online marketplaces responsible for VAT fraud from non-EU businesses on their sites. Since then, the number of non-EU e-businesses that have applied to register for VAT: 2015: 1,650 Now: 43,500 Proof our tough approach to tax evasion is working
text:
In 2016 we made online marketplaces responsible for VAT fraud from non-EU businesses on their sites.

Since then, the number of non-EU e-businesses that have applied to register for VAT:

2015: 1,650

Now: 43,500

Proof our tough approach to tax evasion is working
